Uses of Class
runner.WeatherPolygonPainter

Packages that use WeatherPolygonPainter 
Package Description
runner  

  • Uses of WeatherPolygonPainter in runner

    Subclasses of WeatherPolygonPainter in runner 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ColorByElevation
    ColorByElevation is used to color GeographicPolygons by their elevation.
    class  ColorByLatitude
    ColorByLatitude is used to color GeographicPolygons by their latitude.
    class  ColorByLongitude
    ColorByLongitude is used to color GeographicPolygons by their longitude.
    Fields in runner declared as WeatherPolygonPainter 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private WeatherPolygonPainter CoverageMap.painter
    The painter providing the colors of the resulting image
    Constructors in runner with parameters of type WeatherPolygonPainter 
    Constructor Description
    CoverageMap​(java.util.List<GeographicGridPolygon> polygons, WeatherPolygonPainter painter)
    Constructs a new CoverageMap object using the given polygons and the WeatherPolygonPainter for providing them colors.
